sections.title: Overview

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: This section contains no diagrams; thus, requirements related to diagram formatting are not applicable.
Since the section does not include any diagrams or images, suggestions for expansions to the standardized formatting are not relevant.

sections.meta_notes: The Overview section provides a detailed explanation of ATF1's function, interactions, and significance in cellular processes and cancer, without the use of diagrams or images.
